    • Method Detail

      • insertPost

        public boolean insertPost​(Post post)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Inserts a new post into the POST table.
        Parameters:
        post - A Post object containing the post details.
        Returns:
        true if the post was successfully inserted; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a database error occurs.

      • getAllPosts

        public java.util.List<Post> getAllPosts()
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves all posts from the POST table.
        Returns:
        a List of Post objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a database error occurs.

      • updatePost

        public boolean updatePost​(Post post)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates an existing post in the POST table.
        Parameters:
        post - a Post object containing the new data. The post must have a valid postId.
        Returns:
        true if the update was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a database error occurs.

      • deletePost

        public boolean deletePost​(int postId)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Deletes a post from the POST table based on its post_id.
        Parameters:
        postId - the identifier of the post to delete.
        Returns:
        true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a database error occurs.
